titleStmt.title: A iust defence of the slandered priestes VVherein the reasons of their bearing off to receiue Maister Blackwell to their superiour before the arriuall of his holines breue, are layed downe, and the imputation of disobedience, ambition, contention, scandall, &c. is by able arguments and authorities remoued, the obiection of the aduerse part sufficiently answered, and the Popes sentence in the controuersie truly related. By Iohn Colleton.
titleStmt.author: Colleton, John, 1548-1635.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
